sample_cases.case_text: Vehicle theft reported near MG Road at 10:30 PM. Witness saw blue sedan, license plate partially visible as KL-XX.
Physical assault reported at Central Market. Victim sustained minor injuries. Suspect fled on foot wearing black jacket.
Online fraud complaint. Victim transferred Rs. 50,000 to fake investment scheme. Bank account traced to different state.
Noise complaint from residential area. Loud music from neighboring apartment past midnight.
